attributes.action: Staff of the NHS, Health Workers & Military exempt all Tax payments for 1 year
attributes.additional_details: The selfless attitude of these people should be recognised, and then highlighted to the Nation.
attributes.background: Reward the outstanding personal efforts being made by all of the Staff of the NHS, Care Workers, Mental Health Workers and Military Personnel whose role necessitates a high risk of exposure to the COVID 19 virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
